page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: The total area of farm land in Feock Parish is 723.6 hectares and in the whole of Cornwall there are 278321.4 hectares. In Feock the total area of land rented is 315.8 hectares and the land owned is 407.8 hectares. This shows that the farmers who live in Fe- ock are richer than those in many other parts of Cornwall. There are 37 farms in the area, two thirds of which are only worked part- time, showing that most farmers have to have another job as well. Most are dairy or cattle farms. Most of the farms are under 2 hectares in area. There are hardly any fruit orchards and the only commercial orchards are for gooseberries and blackcurrants. There is only a handful of non-commer- ial orchards. Part of Feock Parish is in our block.
